title: Radiant Diamond Floral Haaram and Jhumka Set - A Touch of Timeless Elegance
materials: Crafted in a dual-tone of 18K Rose and White Gold
adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds. The diamonds are of VS clarity and GH color
ensuring exceptional sparkle. Features the signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster and smooth finish.
features: This set features a contemporary take on the traditional Haaram and Jhumka. The necklace showcases a geometric floral design interlinked with delicate flower motifs, culminating in a striking pendant featuring teardrop outlines. The Jhumkas echo the necklace's design, creating a harmonious and balanced look. The setting is meticulously done to maximize the diamonds' brilliance.
colors: Dual-tone: Rose Gold and White Gold
creating a warm and sophisticated contrast. The diamonds provide a dazzling white sparkle.
occasions: and upscale parties. A stunning statement piece that adds a touch of glamour to any occasion.
description: This necklace set blends the timeless elegance of South Indian jewelry with a modern sensibility. The dual-tone gold adds a unique dimension, while the sparkling diamonds ensure a captivating presence. Meticulously crafted by skilled artisans, this set is a testament to quality and enduring style. This would make a perfect Gift for loved ones as a symbol of enduring love and appreciation.
